item.description: CIS5550 Overview - Data Mining for Business Analytics #cis5550 #course #data-mining #business-analytics #calstate [[Ph.D Lusi Li]], Email: Lli57@calstatela.edu Office hours: Mondays 12-2 Otherwise use zoom
In-Class Participation Week 2 Data and descriptive statistics a)Mean - 2.Which measure represents the value where half the data points are above and the other half are below?
Install R and R Studio R practice Basis of R #cis5550

Ph.D Lusi Li #professor #person #calstate #cis5250 Office Location: ST 617 Telephone: (323) 343-2985 Email: Lli57@calstatela.edu Office Hours: Tuesdays & Thursdays 11:00am-12:00pm and by appointment through Zoom
R-studio as of 28-08-2022 I think I might need to update R-studio. Updated to R version 4.2.1 today (01-09-2022) and R-studio was up to date.
